observation: Account created!  Thanks for setting up your new account, we're glad to have you on board ðŸ¥° To start trading with us, you just need to verify your new account. For most people this is a fully automated process and should take you around 5 minutes. app.accountCreatedPopup.verify There is a temporary delay on the exchange where we source our . This means that we will process your whole order except for the final delivery to your wallet. You will get your order locked in with the rate when we receive your payment, and it will safely stay in our system until we are able to send it. We have seen cases where an outage has lasted several weeks, so please do not order this coin if your delivery is time-critical. Continue Price warning For the size of this order, there may not be enough volume in the market to fill it at the quoted rate. We will fill your order at the best possible market rate, but it is possible that some slippage may occur. This means that you will very likely get less than the quoted amount. The larger the order, the worse the slippage will be. Close
